title: League of Legends 1.0
body:
Hey there! 
My name's Hitchh and I've been playing league of legends for 1 and 1/2 years (started just before season 3 worlds), and during my short experience I learned I missed a lot of the broken fun that was League of Legends < 1.0 and after. I missed 'League of Bruisers'! 

I realise it's a redundant task with no real gain, but is there a chance we could have a throwback to the broken days?

I had a brief look in search and I didn't see a thread already, if this has been answered already don't hesitate to let me know :)

replies.body:
ahhh League of Legends was so great during the early days.

Check out Twisted Fate on release =P (our HUD and map looks so much better now!)

https://youtu.be/pfqDzbtsdOM
u can still play reneck top and rape jaX  so hard that he'll decide to go AFK
